item.description:
Tickets have been purchased.

UPDATE 08/26/11 - Please note that, after speaking to the Stadium Theater, I have closed this event to new RSVPs.  The event is selling out fast, and we will be forced to purchase our tickets on 08/28 - well in advance of the planned date.  Even though the event is now closed to RSVPs, you are still welcome (and encouraged) to purchase your own ticket and attend the show.  If you do, please let me know so we can look for you before or after the show.

Let's try a murder mystery show at Stadium Theater in Woonsocket.  Here is the description of the play:

This Killer Class Reunion  follows the class of 1994 as they celebrate their fateful 15th. Everyone you remember from  high school  will reunite: the nerd, the cheerleader, the gay guy, the jock, the bad boy, even the high school sweethearts, but for one classmate i t will be their last reunion. An interactive mystery dinner theater event, It will be up to you and your friends t o reveal the heartless killer.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $42 and include dinner and the show. The breakdown is as follows:  Ticket - $36. Online Charge - $3.00.  Restoration fee - $1.00.  Paypal Fee - $2.00.

I will purchase all tickets on Monday, September 12th.  If you wish to sit with us, I must have the cost of your ticket in-hand no later than Sunday, September 11th.  If you miss that date, you're still welcome to attend, however you will likely not be seated with the group.

Ticket Payment Options

I haven't had much luck requiring payment with the RSVP, so I'll try something new this time around.  The only option for payment I cannot accept is a personal check.  Other than that, here are the choices:

1.  Send me your e-mail address and I will send you a Paypal Invoice.  Using that method, you may pay be credit card or direct debit, whichever you prefer.

2.  If you prefer, I will send you may address and you can mail me a money order, cashier's check, or any other form of secured payment.  Anything except a personal check is fine.

3.  If you are attending another meet-up before the deadline, you can pay in cash.

Remember, I must have all ticket money in hand by 09/11/11.

Ticket Refund Policy

If the show is sold out by 09/11/11, all money will be refunded in its entirety.  Once I have purchased tickets, however, there are no refunds possible.  Of course, you're encouraged to try to find a replacement if you're unable to make it.

Dinner Information

The cost of the ticket includes a buffet dinner.  Individuals will be responsible for purchasing their own drinks.

Finding Us

You will receive an e-mail with my cell phone number the week prior to the show.  My cell phone will be on until we enter the theater.  If you are running late (or lost in Woonsocket) please call.  We will meet in the lobby of the theater between 6:00 and 6:15. The dinner show starts at 6:30.
item.name: A Killer Class Reunion - Murder Mystery Dinner
